# Moar iSEE things

This vignette contains some examples on even more `iSEE`-things.

We will use the following packages throughout its content (make sure to have them installed if you want to run it interactively)

```{r pkgs}
library("iSEE")
library("iSEEfier")
library("iSEEu")
library("iSEEindex")
```
